description:
The XenAPI is raising a BAD_POWER_STATE exception when we try to destroy an instance which is already halted (for whatever reason).

We should check to see whether an instance is already halted before we attempt the hard_shutdown. In addition, we should probably log this 'unusual' condition.


Traceback: http://paste.openstack.org/show/541/
title: XenServer destroy error on halted instance
